build-progress.txt.summary: Documented completion of Phase 6 integration tests (test-5, test-6, test-7) with detailed test coverage metrics
key_changes: Added comprehensive documentation for 139 total tests covering GET, PUT, and DELETE endpoints
Documented test categories: authentication, validation, success scenarios, error handling, edge cases
Updated build progress to mark test-5, test-6, test-7 as completed
Added implementation notes about test organization and patterns

implementation_plan.json.summary: Updated task statuses to mark integration tests as completed

test_organization.description: Comprehensive test suite follows hierarchical describe blocks
test_organization.evidence: Tests organized by endpoint type (GET/PUT/DELETE) with sub-categories for authentication, validation, scenarios

authentication_patterns.description: Consistent authentication testing across all endpoints
authentication_patterns.evidence: All endpoints tested with both API key and JWT token authentication (4 tests per endpoint type)

validation_strategy.description: Multi-layered validation approach covering parameters, request bodies, and responses
validation_strategy.evidence: Extensive validation tests for ID formats, request body fields, query parameters, and response structures

edge_case_coverage.description: Comprehensive edge case testing including special characters, unicode, boundary values
edge_case_coverage.evidence: Dedicated test categories for edge cases with specific scenarios like leading zeros, large numbers, special characters

helper_function_usage.description: Consistent use of helper functions for test data creation
helper_function_usage.evidence: createTestKey helper function used across all tests for consistent test data

test_implementation_completeness.description: All integration tests were already implemented during initial development
test_implementation_completeness.impact: No new test code needed to be written for test-5, test-6, test-7
test_implementation_completeness.evidence: Test file already contained 139 tests covering all CRUD operations

status_sync_requirement.description: Implementation plan needed to be updated to reflect test completion
status_sync_requirement.impact: Manual status updates required in planning documents

documentation_delay.description: Build progress documentation was significantly behind implementation
documentation_delay.impact: Required substantial documentation update to reflect actual test coverage
documentation_delay.evidence: Build progress updated with detailed Phase 6 documentation

approach_outcome.efficiency: High - leveraged existing comprehensive test suite
discoveries: Admin API integration tests already implemented during CRUD endpoint development
139 tests provide complete coverage of all CRUD operations
Test suite follows established patterns and maintains consistency
Documentation lag revealed opportunity for better real-time tracking

process_improvement.action: Implement real-time test progress tracking to prevent documentation lag
process_improvement.reason: Build progress documentation significantly lagged behind implementation

testing_coverage.action: Consider adding specific test scenarios for authentication tokens with expiration
testing_coverage.reason: Current tests cover authentication but not token expiration scenarios

documentation_maintenance.action: Schedule regular sync between implementation progress and documentation
documentation_maintenance.reason: Implementation status was out of sync with build progress tracking

test_automation.action: Consider automated test status updates in implementation plan
test_automation.reason: Manual status updates are error-prone and time-consuming
